com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware

Interface Servo

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HardwareDevice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServoImpl

    public interface Servo
extends HardwareDevice
    Provides an subset of the functionality of the Servo interface in the FTC SDK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Servo.Direction
      Direction enum to allow software to internally reverse the values to which position is set.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double MAX_POSITION 
      static double MIN_POSITION
      The minimum and maximum positions to which a servo can be moved.

    • Method Summary

      • getDirection

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(double position)
        Set servo position
        Parameters:
        position - Must be between 0 and 1

      • getPosition

        double getPosition()
        Get servo position
        Returns:
        Current servo position

      • scaleRange

        void scaleRange(double min,
                double max)
        Scale range to a pair of values between 0 and 1. After scaling the range, calls to setPosition will still accept values between 0 and 1; getPosition will still return values between 0 and 1. But the true position of the servo will be scaled into the range specified in the call to scaleRange.
